Update to your local contact - NCS Information Evening Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},
There has been an update regarding your local contact.
I’m Ruth Hunt, your local NCS contact up until the NCS start date. I’d like to invite you and {!Contact.FirstName} to a short information evening. It’s a chance to find out more about NCS, ask questions, and meet others who have signed up.
Date: 6/06/2016 Time: 18:00-19:00 Address: Parchmore Methodist Church, 55 Parchmore Rd, Thornton Heath, CR7 8LY
Please let me know if you’re coming by emailing me at ruth.hunt@the-challenge.org - or you can call or text me on 07867545342. Please include the name of your teenager in your reply.
If you can’t make it but would still like to meet us, we’ll be holding other information evenings for NCS programmes running in different areas, or on different dates. Please contact me for details.
I look forward to seeing you at your information evening.
Yours sincerely,
Ruth Hunt The NCS Team - The Challenge
